DOC.brief_summary: The effect of autologous bone marrow mononuclear cells on Motor Neuron Disease/Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Cell Therapy for Motor Neuron Disease/Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Patients with the diagnosis of definite Motor Neuron Disease/amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. Age 1880 years HIV/HBV/HCV Malignancies Bleeding tendencies Pneumonia Renal failure Severe liver dysfunction Severe anemia [hb < 8] Any bone marrow disorder Space occupying lesion in brain Pregnancy and lactation Other acute medical conditions/infections such as respiratory infection and pyrexia left ventricular ejection fraction < 25% Patient on artificial ventilatory support
